name: helseriet-monorepo
description: Helseriet E-commerce Platform - Unified Monorepo with React Frontend and Node.js Backend

scripts.start:clean: npm run cleanup && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:backend
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:frontend && npm run typecheck:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd apps/frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.deploy:backend: cd apps/backend && echo 'Backend deployment not configured yet'

author: Mandy Margjervikrygg
